genre_description: An alternate history historical drama set during the Boer War, featuring an advanced AI interface integrated into an espionage and legal thriller narrative.

ai_characters.name: Linnet
ai_characters.description: A subtle, sophisticated AI interface carried by Evelyn Carr, providing tactical data, translations, and philosophical reflections to assist in uncovering truth and maintaining justice.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time situational awareness and tactical warnings about patrol shifts and sentry behaviors.
behaviors.quote: Night draft at the west door, the voice murmured. Curtain falls at final applause, then rises for untidy bow. Between those gestures, twenty heartbeats. Patrol shift at the rear lane occurs earlier this week by a margin you called ‘a hymn.’

behaviors.description: Translates foreign languages and provides historical and legal precedents to assist the defense.
behaviors.quote: The word on the screen was precise, white on muted green: Heese—Dienstordnung, Kolonie. A second line surfaced, spooling gentle: Pfarrer Daniel Heese—Bericht abgelehnt, Pietersburg.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and moral grounding, framing the importance of truth and conscience.
behaviors.quote: Truth travels best when carried by those who refuse to look away.

behaviors.description: Identifies minute physical details like thread traces and lacquer wear to guide the characters through a records room.
behaviors.quote: Not the clerk. Thread traces on the tag suggest it was cut and retied. Current owner smooths fabric when he waits, an unconscious habit.

behaviors.description: Suggests subtle behavioral strategies to avoid suspicion, such as mimicking the walk of a cleaner.
behaviors.quote: If you walk like someone who has broken something and needs a broom, he will put you in the category of women fixing messes and will not watch your hands.

behaviors.description: Summarizes the outcome of the mission with a focus on moral integrity and preservation of facts.
behaviors.quote: Record preserved; precedent noted; conscience intact.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Linnet) as a highly sophisticated, benevolent, and aligned confidant. Linnet's assistance is entirely focused on helping the human characters navigate a complex moral and physical landscape to ensure that truth is recorded and justice is sought. The AI acts as an invisible hand that empowers human agency rather than subverting it, perfectly matching the project's goal of positive alignment narratives.
